```{r message=FALSE}

library(data.table)

library(rbenchmark)
set.seed(123)

```

```{r}

n <- 100e6

d <- data.frame(y = runif(n))
dt <- as.data.table(d)

benchmark(
  d$y2 <- 2*d$y,
  dt[,y2 := 2*y],
replications=1, columns=c("test", "elapsed", "relative"), order=NULL)

```
